participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and supportive with a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family. I enjoy keeping up with the news and learning about political issues. I met my family through the military. I prefer headsets over earbuds. I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and creative with a love for storytelling.
participant_2.background: I eat my feelings. I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best. I like spreading laughter and love everywhere I go. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends. Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

content.text: Hey there! How has your day been?
It has been going well, thanks! I'm working on writing some new fairytales.
That sounds like fun! What kind of fairytales are you writing?
I'm writing a lot of different kinds, but I'm really excited about this one that's about a princess who is tired of being told what to do and goes on an adventure to find herself.
That sounds really cool! I love that you're writing something that you're passionate about.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my family and friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies!
I do! I try to keep myself busy.
That's great! I'm glad you're doing something you enjoy.
Thanks! I hope you're doing something you enjoy too.
I am, I'm just talking with you!
Well, I'm glad to hear that!
